## Before you write, find an outlet for your work.


--
### Pick a target journal

1. [Compare publishing policies of prospective journals](/https://transpose-publishing.github.io/#/)

2. Identify the impact factor of prospective journals

* [Psychology Journals](https://www.apa.org/pubs/journals/resources/impact-factors)
* [Journal Citation Reports](https://www.scimagojr.com/journalrank.php?category=3304)

--

### Info to find

* Page limit
* Citation limit
* Citation style (APA and AMA are most common)
* Time for first review and time to acceptance
* Structure of article
